functions.name: execute_sql_query
functions.description: Execute SQL queries against Salesforce data to retrieve account performance, sales metrics, and analytics data.

query.description: The SQL query to execute against the Salesforce data warehouse

limit.description: Maximum number of rows to return (default: 100, max: 1000)

format.description: How to format the query results

functions.name: get_account_metrics
functions.description: Get key performance metrics for a specific account or set of accounts.

account_ids.description: List of account IDs to analyze

metrics.description: Specific metrics to retrieve: revenue, opportunities, activities, engagement

time_period.description: Time period for metrics: last_30_days, last_quarter, last_year, ytd

functions.name: analyze_sales_trends
functions.description: Analyze sales trends and patterns across accounts, territories, or time periods.

dimension.description: The dimension to analyze trends by

period.description: Time period granularity for trend analysis

filters.description: Additional filters to apply to the analysis

functions.name: generate_performance_report
functions.description: Generate comprehensive performance reports for accounts, territories, or sales teams.

report_type.description: Type of performance report to generate

scope.description: Scope of the report: specific account IDs, territory, or 'all'

include_charts.description: Whether to include visual charts in the report
